Heritage Breed Pasture-Raised Pork

Heritage Breed Pasture-Raised Pork

Meat and Poultry Category

Description

Our Heritage Breed Pasture-Raised Pork comes from pigs that roam freely in natural pastures, living as nature intended. These heritage breeds are chosen for their ability to thrive outdoors and for the exceptional quality of meat they produce, known for its depth of flavor and tenderness. Raised without the use of antibiotics or growth hormones, our pork reflects our commitment to sustainable and humane farming practices. The pigs` diet consists of natural forages, supplemented with non-GMO grains, ensuring a nutritious and flavorful end product. By choosing our pasture-raised pork, you`re not only enjoying a delicious meal but also supporting ethical farming practices that respect the animals and the environment.

Specifications

  • Weight: Varies by cut, from 1 lb packages for sausages to 5+ lbs for roasts
  • Size: Cut to a variety of sizes to suit any culinary need
  • Packaging: Biodegradable packaging
  • Nutritional Information: Rich in protein, vitamins B6 and B12, and minerals like zinc and selenium

Benefits

  • Supports Biodiversity

    Promotes the survival of heritage breeds and sustainable farming.

  • Health-Conscious Choice

    Naturally raised for a healthier, leaner meat.

  • Exceptional Flavor

    Unmatched richness and depth of taste.
